page.title: 06AN EIGHT YEAR OLD'S DAY
page.content: My name is Phillip.I am eight.I live in Ruabon.My address is 7 Maelor Place.I go to Ysgol Maes-y-llan.This is how the day starts.At 7 o'clock I get my breakfast.I have rice crispies.Then I get dressed.Then I wired up a light.I am quite good at electric.My father helps me.Then after returning from school I have my tea and carried on wiring the light.We searched for the last piece and then we put the bulb in and switched it on.Then we turned the knob and it could go bright or dark.Then I went to sleep with it.
